input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Walther Waffen PPK P22 Pistole firearms cotton patches Logo Vest Jacket Hat Hoodie Backpack Iron On patches

Product specifications:
High quality embroidered iron sew on cotton patches
Headbonding glue surface on the back side for ironing on cotton material
Only iron on cotton without steam function. Leather or synthetic fabric must be stitched on.
Strong, bright colours! High quality embroidery! Perfectly chained!
Buy with confidence! 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed!
Ships from Thailand. Free shipping.
input_text.Response A: Looking for a beautiful and easy to display holiday wreath?  This National Tree Crestwood Spruce Wreath is 30 inches in diameter and is pre-strung with 50 battery-operated, UL listed warm white LED lights.  It is fire-resistant and non-allergenic.  The lights have an On/Off timer, with 6 hours of operation during the day and 18 hours at night.  This beautiful wreath is trimmed with red berries, pine cones and glitter, and can be used indoors or covered outdoors.
input_text.Response B: This is a high quality embroidered iron-on cotton patch. It's perfect for your jacket, backpack, hat, or hoodie. It's strong, bright colors, and perfectly chained design will make you stand out from the crowd. It is guaranteed to make you satisfied. It's shipped from Thailand for free and includes a free patch!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is a totally different topic.
